main event: On May 11, 1952, a UFO was reported observed in Deephaven, Minnesota by a liaison pilot.
interesting points: The object moved at great speed and had greater luminosity than a falling star,The sighting lasted approximately 15 seconds,The object was witnessed moving in a direction of about 270 degrees,It was visible for about 75% of the sky before disappearing over the horizon,The observer was a captain in the U.S.A.F. reserves and had previous experience as a liaison pilot during World War II.
witness description: Liaison pilot, familiar with aircraft in flight.
